title: React Basics and Work With Components
description: Let's introduce with THE most popular JavaScript library you can use and learn these days to build modern, reactive user interfaces for the web.

title: JavaScript Refresher
description: In this module, I provided a brief introduction into some core next-gen JavaScript features, of course focusing on the ones you'll see the most in this course

title: React State and Working with Events
description: This module is all about hooks and events. These are the most important part of react.
details: Listening to events and working with event handlers

Child and parent component communication(Bottom to up)

title: React Routing
description: React Router is a standard library for routing in React.It enables the navigation among views of various components in a React Application, allows changing the browser URL, and keeps the UI in sync with the URL. Let's understand it.
details: Install react router and understand the document
Create a project using react router documents
Analyzing different examples with react router

title: Beautiful React Projects and Deploy
description: A beautiful project we will build together using react's all exclusive features and understand them all.

title: Debugging React Apps
description: We will debug our projects together. Understand the debugging process and the react devtools.
